document.full_text: the european union will propose offering at least 150 million euros ($219 million) in compensation to farmers affected by the e.coli outbreak, the european commissioner for agriculture said on tuesday.
document.title: eu to offer 150 million euros to e.coli-affected farmers
lines_and_colors: the european union will propose offering at least 150 million euros ($219 million) in compensation to farmers affected by the e.coli outbreak, the european commissioner for agriculture said on tuesday.
